title: Best Cases For The Oppo Find X8 Pro
description: Protect your Oppo Find X8's Hasselblad-branded camera and unique back design with these premium cases.
author: Irene Okpanachi
excerpt: Protect your Oppo Find X8's Hasselblad-branded camera and unique back design with these premium cases.
text: Editorial Note: Talk Android may contain affiliate links on some articles. If you make a purchase through these links, we will earn a commission at no extra cost to you. Learn more. Back in November 2024, we reviewed the Oppo Find X8 Pro, and its design stood out in both the Pearl White and Space Black finishes. A durable metallic frame, and a circular camera housing with Hasselblad branding added to its appeal. The Pearl White version, in particular, has a multi-layered texture that makes gripping it easier. Related: Oppo Find X8 Mini Is Coming Best overall Teroxa striped magnetic case $27.99 Combine style and protection with this classy case. The striped back looks great with both business and chic styles. The camera cover keeps your lenses safe, and doubles as a stand when you want to give your hands a break. Also, the magnetic back works with wireless charging.  Best premium HWPIVOX PU leather case $12.87 The perfect case for environmentalists doesn’t exist. Okay, it does. Sustainability is the keyword here as this case uses PU leather instead of real animal hide. It's a synthetic material and has a smaller environmental impact compared to traditional leather. The orange color isn’t so jarring either. But if you’re not into that, you can grab it in red, blue, or classic black for a more understated look. Best budget Ustiya clear case $8.90 There are plenty of reasons to hate clear cases. They’re prone to yellowing, fingerprints, and even feel cheap. But this one does a great job of challenging those stereotypes. It's from a durable TPU with built-in airbags on all four corners that raise the edges like ears. These ears absorb shocks from accidental drops, while the raised lip around the camera protects your lenses without adding unnecessary bulk.  Vavies shockproof case $9.99 Some cases are bold and in-your-face, while others are subtle and still offer similar levels of protection. Vavies’ case is the latter. It doesn’t draw too much attention, and it’s fingerprint resistant. Plus, the raised lips around the camera and screen prevent direct impact from falls. Wousunly astronaut case $14.25 If you like to make a statement with your accessories, you'd love this animated case. Your kickstand is a tiny astronaut, which is a fun and unexpected detail that adds character while also being practical.  Klsify custom case $14.99 Sentimental possessions deserve to be protected, and a case for your Oppo Find X8 Pro should reflect that same level of care. With just your Spotify code, you can immortalize a special song or memory. Choose a template, upload your picture and add text, then submit your design to complete your order.  MRRSIWEI flowery shockproof case $10.99 Add a touch of femininity to your Oppo Find X8 Pro with this floral glitter case. Its soft pink hue makes it perfect for women and the built-in ring stand lets you enjoy hands-free moments. Related: Find X8 Pro or Galaxy S24 Ultra All round protection for your Oppo We've made it easier to pick a case for your Oppo Find X8 Pro. You can go for a slim or clear case if you want to keep the design visible, or choose something more rugged for extra drop protection. Don't forget to pick up a screen guard too, as it’ll keep your display safe from cracks and give your phone a longer lifespan. Irene is an experienced writer with four years in the Tech, E-commerce, and Food niches. She currently writes for Talk Android and Android Police, where she geeks out about the latest innovative practices, solutions, and gadgets. When not writing, Irene embraces her inner couch potato, finding joy in gaming, singing, music, and of course, eating. Previous Post
html:
Editorial Note: Talk Android may contain affiliate links on some articles. If you make a purchase through these links, we will earn a commission at no extra cost to you. Learn more.

Back in November 2024, we reviewed the Oppo Find X8 Pro, and its design stood out in both the Pearl White and Space Black finishes. A durable metallic frame, and a circular camera housing with Hasselblad branding added to its appeal. The Pearl White version, in particular, has a multi-layered texture that makes gripping it easier.

Related: Oppo Find X8 Mini Is Coming

Best overall

Teroxa striped magnetic case

$27.99

Combine style and protection with this classy case. The striped back looks great with both business and chic styles. The camera cover keeps your lenses safe, and doubles as a stand when you want to give your hands a break. Also, the magnetic back works with wireless charging. 

Best premium

HWPIVOX PU leather case

$12.87

The perfect case for environmentalists doesn’t exist. Okay, it does. Sustainability is the keyword here as this case uses PU leather instead of real animal hide. It's a synthetic material and has a smaller environmental impact compared to traditional leather. The orange color isn’t so jarring either. But if you’re not into that, you can grab it in red, blue, or classic black for a more understated look.

Best budget

Ustiya clear case

$8.90

There are plenty of reasons to hate clear cases. They’re prone to yellowing, fingerprints, and even feel cheap. But this one does a great job of challenging those stereotypes. It's from a durable TPU with built-in airbags on all four corners that raise the edges like ears. These ears absorb shocks from accidental drops, while the raised lip around the camera protects your lenses without adding unnecessary bulk. 

Vavies shockproof case

$9.99

Some cases are bold and in-your-face, while others are subtle and still offer similar levels of protection. Vavies’ case is the latter. It doesn’t draw too much attention, and it’s fingerprint resistant. Plus, the raised lips around the camera and screen prevent direct impact from falls.

Wousunly astronaut case

$14.25

If you like to make a statement with your accessories, you'd love this animated case. Your kickstand is a tiny astronaut, which is a fun and unexpected detail that adds character while also being practical. 

Klsify custom case

$14.99

Sentimental possessions deserve to be protected, and a case for your Oppo Find X8 Pro should reflect that same level of care. With just your Spotify code, you can immortalize a special song or memory. Choose a template, upload your picture and add text, then submit your design to complete your order. 

MRRSIWEI flowery shockproof case

$10.99

Add a touch of femininity to your Oppo Find X8 Pro with this floral glitter case. Its soft pink hue makes it perfect for women and the built-in ring stand lets you enjoy hands-free moments.

Related: Find X8 Pro or Galaxy S24 Ultra

All round protection for your Oppo

We've made it easier to pick a case for your Oppo Find X8 Pro. You can go for a slim or clear case if you want to keep the design visible, or choose something more rugged for extra drop protection. Don't forget to pick up a screen guard too, as it’ll keep your display safe from cracks and give your phone a longer lifespan.

Irene is an experienced writer with four years in the Tech, E-commerce, and Food niches. She currently writes for Talk Android and Android Police, where she geeks out about the latest innovative practices, solutions, and gadgets. When not writing, Irene embraces her inner couch potato, finding joy in gaming, singing, music, and of course, eating.
